LEONINA71.name: Via Leonina 71
LEONINA71.self_checkin_instructions: Main building door: code 7171 + key symbol (or round key). Apartment door: use the long square-ended key; pull the heavy door towards you and turn counter-clockwise to open.
LEONINA71.checkout_instructions: Please check out by 11:00. Leave the keys on the table, switch off AC, lights and hot plate, and close the door.
LEONINA71.wifi_ssid: See router label on the back
LEONINA71.wifi_password: See router label on the back
LEONINA71.wifi_note: Router is on the table. If the connection is slow: toggle Wi-Fi on your phone; power-cycle the router (off 10s → on) and wait 2–3 minutes.
LEONINA71.water_note: Cold water is drinkable. Hot water should always be available.
LEONINA71.boiler_warning: Please do NOT touch the switch on the left side of the bathroom mirror (it controls the hot water).
LEONINA71.boiler_reset_steps: Run the tap 30–60s; check the boiler light is on. If problems persist, contact the host.
LEONINA71.bathroom_amenities: Hairdryer, bath mat, toilet paper, hand soap.
LEONINA71.towels_note: Beds are made. Each guest has 1 large, 1 medium, 1 small towel.
LEONINA71.lighting_kitchen: Switch is on the right side of the stairs (facing the kitchen).
LEONINA71.lighting_terrace: Switch is inside the apartment, on the right before exiting to the terrace.
LEONINA71.appliance_notes: AC: turn off when leaving (eco 23–24°C). Electric hot plate: switch off after use; never leave pots unattended. Terrace umbrella: tie to railing and ALWAYS close when away (wind risk!). Washer/Dishwasher: prefer eco cycles.
LEONINA71.plants_note: If you like, feel free to water the plants daily (except cacti).
LEONINA71.trash_rules: Use the courtyard bins; separate glass, plastic/metal and paper as posted. General waste daily.
LEONINA71.eat_recommendations: Nearby: La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali (Via della Madonna dei Monti 9, +39 06 679 8643) — classic Roman trattoria. Ai Tre Scalini (Via Panisperna 251, +39 06 4890 7495) — historic wine bar with small plates. Blackmarket Hall (Via Panisperna 101) — cocktails. La Barrique (Via del Boschetto 41) — cozy wine bar.
LEONINA71.drink_recommendations: Blackmarket Hall (cocktails, Via Panisperna 101). La Barrique (wine bar, Via del Boschetto 41). Piazza Madonna dei Monti for aperitivo.
LEONINA71.shopping_tips: Mercato Monti (weekend vintage & designers, Via Leonina 46). Via del Boschetto & Via Urbana: artisanal boutiques and leather goods.
LEONINA71.visit_highlights: Colosseum (10 min), Roman Forum (12 min), San Pietro in Vincoli (Michelangelo’s Moses). Hidden gems: Santa Prassede mosaics; Scalinata dei Borgia; underground of San Martino ai Monti (guided).
LEONINA71.useful_numbers: Emergency 112 • Police 113 • Ambulance 118 • Fire 115 • Taxi 06 3570 • City info 06 0606.
